p: Moreover, in the case of α-glucosidase TLC-bioautography, two wide white active zones appeared on TLC-bioautogram. The corresponding spot from the control plate of both active zones were scrapped, and MS analysis was performed. Data obtained from MS revealed five compounds at an R f value of 0.95 including β-sitosterol (m/ z = 414.70), vanillic acid ( m/z = 168.04), ellagic acid ( m/z = 302.19), jatrorrhizine ( m/z = 338.38), and columbamine ( m/z = 338.38) while four componds at a 0.85 R f value identified as kaempferol 7-O-glucoside ( m/z = 448.38), columbin ( m/z = 358.39), isorhamnetin ( m/z = 316.26), and cannabisin G (624.69) ( Figure 2 and Table 3 ).
